title: Curse Voice, why doesnt anyone use it?
body: As the title says, i have curse voice and i keep it active. I am yet to see anyone else in my game who has it.

replies.body:
Squeaker and Salty as %%%% people.

That's why.
I do with my team but I'd rather not be talking to others as they can be a bit.... weird
My music > some fgt talking about his sick penta he got the other day

curse is a really good program but i only use it to talk to friends
and this

> [{quoted}](name=Oz SammyD X,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v00nLvZx,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2014-12-20T15:50:30.701+0000)
>
> My music > some fgt talking about his sick penta he got the other day
because there are a lot of perple are not very fluent in English conversations.
does it still tell you other people that use it? or do you ask? also why would i want to voice chat with people I'm never gonna see again.
I use it. I know quite a few others who use it. That said, that's a small portion of players.
because i'd rather not listen to 14 year olds swear at me... i prefer to read it Kappa
